prime.layout.algorithms.IHorizontalAlgorithm

type
interface
extends
ILayoutAlgorithm
available in
swf
Interface to make sure that a given algorithm is meant for horizontal layouting.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

algorithmChanged(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal0

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Signal that will be dispatched when properties of the algorithm have been changed and the layout needs to be validated again.

direction(default,null) : prime.core.geom.space.Horizontal

group(default,null) : prime.layout.ILayoutContainer

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

apply() : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method will reposition the children in the group according to the rulse of the algorithm.

dispose() : Void

inherited from prime.core.traits.IDisposable

getDepthForBounds(bounds : prime.core.geom.IRectangle) : Int

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method will return the depth that belongs to the given coordinates. The depth of an object depends on the type of algorithm that is used. Before calling this method, the method 'removeStartPosFromPoint' should be called to make sure the point is valid within the algorithms.

getDepthOfFirstVisibleChild() : Int

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method will return the depth of the first visible child, based on: - childWidth / childHeight - explicitWidth / explicitHeight - scrollPos.x / scrollPos.y

getMaxVisibleChildren() : Int

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method will return the maximum visible children based on: - childWidth / childHeight - explicitWidth / explicitHeight

isInvalid(changes : Int) : Bool

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method indicating if the changes of a layoutcontainer-child should make the layoutcontainer revalidate

prepareValidate() : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method to prepare the algorithm to validate. This method can be used to set properties that are needed for both the validateHorizontal method and the validateVertical method.

scrollToDepth(depth : Int) : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method to change to scroll-position of the layoutcontainer to make the given child-depth visible

validate() : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Method will measure the given target according to the algorithms rules. The result of the measuring should be put in Layoutgroup.MeasuredWidth Layoutgroup.MeasuredHeight

validateHorizontal() : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Measure the width of the group according to the rules of the algorithm. Call LayoutAlgorithmBase.setGroupWidth() to apply the value to the group.

validateVertical() : Void

inherited from prime.layout.algorithms.ILayoutAlgorithm
Measure the height of the group according to the rules of the algorithm. Call LayoutAlgorithmBase.setGroupHeight() to apply the value to the group.
